title: Client not launching. It's been at least a week
body: Trying to get my game to launch and the client will not open. I have tried every problem fix and every troubleshoot even uninstalling and reinstalling and it still will not open the launcher. I go into my task manager and it just has the lol patcher opened three times trying to work. Please anyone gimme some help.

replies.body:
There are a number of things that could be causing this. We've consolidated the most common solutions inside our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I recommend working through those steps as a next move.

Let me know if those steps caused any positive change.
There has been no change at all my client will still not launch... and I did every single one of the steps in this guide

In that case, there are likely other network settings that are preventing your launcher from reaching the patching service. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if you still continue to see issues after taking those steps.
I'm having the same problem, I can lauch it if I keep trying over and over, but I dont know how to get it back to normal, when It would just always lauch after clicking ''launch''
